Articles.Content:
[CENTER][SIZE=7][COLOR=#ff0000][B][U]The Low Munar Orbit Challenge

[/U][/B][SIZE=2]"You have to be kidding me" - Bill Kerman
[/SIZE][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[SIZE=2][SIZE=5]This one is simple. See how close you can orbit to the Mun.

[/SIZE][/SIZE]

[LIST]
[*][B][U]Easy [/U][/B]: Achieve an orbit with a Per. of 20 km
[*][U][B]Moderate: [/B][/U] Achieve a stable orbit below 15x15 km
[*][B][U]Hard:[/U][/B] Achieve a stable 6x6 km orbit
[*][U][B]Expert: [/B][/U]Go beyond a stable orbit of 6x6km
[*][SIZE=4][B][U]Extreme: Go beyond a stable orbit of 6x6 km, dock with another craft and return back to Kerbin with all kerbals still alive.



[/U][/B][/SIZE]I can't post the pictures of one I did in hard mode yet. I will soon, hopefully. [U][B]Please don't use stock crafts and please do not cheat.(Hyperedit, F12, etc...) No part mods allowed.

[SIZE=6]
Submit pictures of orbit and in game.
[SIZE=5]If you like, you can link to your challenge submission in your signature if it means that much to you.
[SIZE=4]If you choose to do so, put which difficulty you completed it on in your signature.

[/SIZE][/SIZE][/SIZE]

[/B][/U]
[/LIST] Edited November 16, 2015 by Sequinox
Added rules

[quote name='Sequinox'][CENTER][U][B]Please don't use stock crafts.[/B][/U][/CENTER]
[/QUOTE][CENTER]

[/CENTER]
Well there goes my day... Still a hard challenge... Ill give it a go.
This is the easiest challenge I've seen in a while. Also, I can use hyperedit and all the mods I want according to the vague conditions and rules.
Still a good challenge.. add an extra-extreme mode for a polar orbit under 6km-highest elevation is 7.5km at the poles. At equator it is 5.3km

[quote name='RA3236']Still a good challenge.. add an extra-extreme mode for a polar orbit under 6km-highest elevation is 7.5km at the poles. At equator it is 5.3km[/QUOTE]Good? I could debate that. I do low Mun orbits all the time. Sure, I get lucky by missing mountains SOMETIMES, but this is easier than breathing if you look at it.

Sure, it was easy for me too, but not for other people. If it's easy for you either do it or don't do it, otherwise you just sound like you're looking for attention.

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Where did you get the badges in your sig, by the way?

[quote name='Sequinox']Sure, it was easy for me too, but not for other people. If it's easy for you either do it or don't do it, otherwise you just sound like you're looking for attention.

[COLOR=silver][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Where did you get the badges in your sig, by the way?[/QUOTE]Challenges on this forum. Goddard Problem was about how high you could get with a pre-built rocket, T-Prize for making a Tylo SSTO. Both were hard and fun.
it's very easy to do a stable low munar orbit ( 15x15 km ) but i will sent for you a mission when i do a stable low munar orbit of ([SIZE=5]10 x 10 km[SIZE=1])[/SIZE][/SIZE]
